message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. We believe its value surpasses $1200000, reflecting its unique features and benefits. To extend this opportunity to you, we are offering it at an exclusive price of $1500000. We understand that such an investment might require careful consideration, and we are committed to providing you with all the information needed to make an informed decision. Please let us know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions about the product.

I appreciate the time you took to present the product to me, and I'm interested in purchasing it. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. This is the maximum I'm willing to pay for the product. Would you be open to considering this price?
